Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: It's very good pub , i recommend everyone to come here, the atmosphere is really great, the service is kind and cordial ðŸ˜ƒ

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: So cozy and really friendly staff. Highly recommend.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Nice and very friendly location in / near the red light district. One of the guys - I think his name is Jessy - was really communicative, so it all went into a delightful evening!

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Awesome atmosphere and staff. Worth a stop for a drink

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: It's a good place, not as expensive as could be considering the situation and the fact that allows to smoke and drink (not so common in Amsterdam). Apart of that, a basic bar in the center with kind service.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Favorite place to relax and smoke in Amsterdam - complimentary herbal mix with papers a great touch. Always spend most of my time in Amsterdam here with a hot choc

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: This coffee shop won over my non smoking partner to allow me to chill and smoke. Really enjoyed the cosyness and they had the champs league on TV. Good vibes!

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Whenever i'm in Amsterdam this is always one of my go to haunts! Incredible atmosphere, friendly staff, and quite possibly you'll find one of the cheapest, and best tasting pints around the dam!

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text:
Frequent visit to Amsterdam, there used to be alot more cafes as good as this one.
You can be alone to smoke whatever you want in the shops front main areas â€¦

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: very good atmosphere. nice place to chill and drink.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Great place with friendly staff good deals on beer iv been here a few times can't wait to go back

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Really friendly staff who make you feel welcome, good atmosphere, decent prices and a good place to watch football with a beer and a joint

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Amazing place to visit for a smoke. We had a lovely time here and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Really recommend.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Great, friendly staff. Chill atmosphere. Check out the lights on the ceiling. Made in house; too big to leave the establishment

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Bit of a dive bar, but free nuts, cheaper beer, and customers can drink and smoke if they wish. GREAT MUSIC, rock mainly

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Very friendly staff, good drink specials and nice atmosphere.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Great wee spot to stop at for a quick smoke and a pint. Tobacco area upstairs, otherwise you can stay downstairs.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Friendly staff, cheap drinks, good atmosphere!

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Best beer prices and the most friendly staff. Had a fantastic time.

Name: Cafe The Tribe
Review Text: Great place cheaper than most bars and great staff couldn't fault the place
